```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

library(patchwork)
```

## Load summarized data

```{r}
load("output/summarized_ariba.RDA")
load("output/summarized_groot.RDA")
```

```{r}
all<-rbind(select(refname_all_ariba, `ARO Accession`), select(refname_all_groot, `ARO Accession`))%>%unique()
all<-all%>%mutate(Ariba=ifelse(`ARO Accession` %in% refname_all_ariba$`ARO Accession`, 1, 0),
                  Groot=ifelse(`ARO Accession` %in% refname_all_groot$`ARO Accession`, 1, 0),
                  test=ifelse(Ariba==1 & Groot==1, "Groot+Ariba", ifelse(Ariba==1, "Ariba", "Groot")))


prop.table(table(all$test))*100

```
